tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently had the pleasure of receiving dental care from an incredible team at the dental practice of Dr. Nishant, Dr. Pooja, and Dr. Payal, and I must say, my experience was nothing short of exceptional.

From the moment I walked into the clinic, I was greeted by a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The reception staff was friendly, efficient, and made the check-in process seamless. The waiting area was comfortable and well-maintained, setting the tone for a positive experience.

Dr. Nishant, the lead dentist, demonstrated an unparalleled level of professionalism and expertise. His comprehensive knowledge of dentistry was evident as he took the time to thoroughly explain each step of the dental procedure. His gentle approach and attention to detail immediately put me at ease, making the entire process comfortable and virtually painless.

Dr. Pooja's dedication to patient care was evident throughout my visit. She displayed a genuine concern for my well-being, answering all my questions with patience and clarity. Her meticulous work ethic and precision during the treatment showcased her commitment to delivering high-quality dental care.

Dr. Payal, another integral member of the team, complemented the practice with her expertise and friendly demeanor. Her approachable nature made it easy to discuss any concerns, and her skillful execution of dental procedures further emphasized the clinic's commitment to excellence.

What impressed me most about this dental team was their emphasis on patient education. They not only treated my dental issues but also took the time to educate me on preventive care and maintenance, empowering me to take control of my oral health.

The clinic itself is equipped with state-of-the-art technology, reflecting their commitment to staying current with advancements in dental science. The cleanliness and organization of the facility further added to the overall positive experience.

In conclusion, I highly recommend Dr. Nishant, Dr. Pooja, and Dr. Payal for anyone seeking top-notch dental care. Their professionalism, expertise, and genuine concern for their patients make them stand out in the field. I left the clinic with a healthier smile and a deep appreciation for the exceptional care provided by this outstanding dental team.

Dr Pooja Shetty and Dr. Nishanth Shetty are highly skilled professionals who exude confidence and expertise in their field. review: I had visited the clinic for my bleeding gums problem. The doctor did an initial diagnosis. She explained how my misaligned teeth lead to food being stuck around incisors and canines which in turn leads to gum bleeding. I was recommended a teeth cleaning session which would eradicate all the stuck food from the back and front parts of my incisors and canines. She prescribed minimal medicines and I got rid of my gum bleeding problems within 2 days. I would definitely recommend this clinic for your comprehensive oral care.

review:
Dr. Pooja Shetty made a thorough diagnosis and let me know what my problem is and recommended necessary steps I can take to keep the area clean and problem free, instead of suggesting the removal of wisdom teeth which almost every doctor in the past has advised.
She recommended me flossing (water flossing), which I've always avoided but should start doing.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went for a consultation for my minor son since he had tooth pain. It was found to be caused by dental cavities on the milk tooth. The doctor suggested the treatment options and she extracted the problematic tooth without damaging the erupting permanent tooth. My child felt so comfortable around Dr Pooja. Thanks a lot, Doctor. You were cordial, knowledgeable, and extremely patient. Will certainly visit you again. 🙂
reply_text:
Thank you so much ma’am 
Glad we would help ☺️
